name: Paul Truitt
bio: I'm a Software Engineer and Full-Stack Developer driven to create positive change through technology. My background as a theatre actor and artistic collaborator combines with excellent coding chops to give me a unique skillset that slots into any cast of characters. I find great satisfaction in working on teams and solving problems and I am passionate about writing code. I embrace a growth mindset on a daily basis, relishing in new knowledge. I look forward to leveling up with your team.
